user_route: To travel from Select Citywalk Mall to Safdarjung Tomb, begin by heading west on District Centre from the mall. Turn right onto Press Enclave Marg and continue straight, passing by Saket Metro Station. After that, take another right onto Sri Aurobindo Marg. Continue on this road, passing under the AIIMS flyover. Stay on Sri Aurobindo Marg as you proceed towards Safdarjung Tomb. The tomb will be on your left, just before you reach the intersection with Safdarjung Road.
actual_route: Select Citywalk Mall to Safdarjung Tomb
